scripts.android: cp -f lib/src/cclib-rt.js web/src/artemis/cclib-rt.js && cp -f web/main.js ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets/main.js && cp -f web/project_android.json ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets/project.json && cat ./web/src/resource.js LF ./web/src/app.js LF ./web/src/lib/cclib-rt.js LF ./web/src/lib/utils/Bag.js LF ./web/src/lib/utils/BitSet.js LF ./web/src/lib/utils/MathUtils.js LF ./web/src/lib/utils/Map.js LF ./web/src/lib/utils/HashMap.js LF ./web/src/lib/utils/ImmutableBag.js LF ./web/src/lib/utils/IRandum.js LF ./web/src/lib/utils/Randum.js LF ./web/src/lib/utils/Timer.js LF ./web/src/lib/utils/UUID.js LF ./web/src/lib/annotations/Mapper.js LF ./web/src/lib/Component.js LF ./web/src/lib/Aspect.js LF ./web/src/lib/Entity.js LF ./web/src/lib/Manager.js LF ./web/src/lib/World.js LF ./web/src/lib/ComponentManager.js LF ./web/src/lib/ComponentType.js LF ./web/src/lib/ComponentMapper.js LF ./web/src/lib/EntityManager.js LF ./web/src/lib/EntitySystem.js LF ./web/src/lib/managers/GroupManager.js LF ./web/src/lib/managers/PlayerManager.js LF ./web/src/lib/managers/TagManager.js LF ./web/src/lib/managers/TeamManager.js LF ./web/src/lib/systems/DelayedEntityProcessingSystem.js LF ./web/src/lib/systems/EntityProcessingSystem.js LF ./web/src/lib/systems/IntervalEntitySystem.js LF ./web/src/lib/systems/VoidEntitySystem.js LF ./web/src/lib/systems/IntervalEntityProcessingSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/core/Constants.js LF ./web/src/example/components/Bounds.js LF ./web/src/example/components/ColorAnimation.js LF ./web/src/example/components/Enemy.js LF ./web/src/example/components/Expires.js LF ./web/src/example/components/Health.js LF ./web/src/example/components/ParallaxStar.js LF ./web/src/example/components/Player.js LF ./web/src/example/components/Position.js LF ./web/src/example/components/ScaleAnimation.js LF ./web/src/example/components/SoundEffect.js LF ./web/src/example/components/Sprite.js LF ./web/src/example/components/Velocity.js LF ./web/src/example/core/EntityFactory.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/CollisionSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/ColorAnimationSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/EntitySpawningTimerSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/ExpiringSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/HealthRenderSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/HudRenderSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/MovementSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/ParallaxStarRepeatingSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/RemoveOffscreenShipsSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/ScaleAnimationSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/SoundEffectSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/systems/SpriteRenderSystem.js LF ./web/src/example/core/GameScreen.js LF ./web/src/example/core/SpaceshipWarrior.js LF ./web/main.js | java -jar packages/closure-compiler/lib/vendor/compiler.jar --warning_level=QUIET --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --js_output_file ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assetsartemis.js
scripts.build: cat web/src/lib/cclib-rt.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Bag.js LF web/src/lib/utils/BitSet.js LF web/src/lib/utils/MathUtils.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Map.js LF web/src/lib/utils/HashMap.js LF web/src/lib/utils/ImmutableBag.js LF web/src/lib/utils/IRandum.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Randum.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Timer.js LF web/src/lib/utils/UUID.js LF web/src/lib/annotations/Mapper.js LF web/src/lib/Component.js LF web/src/lib/Aspect.js LF web/src/lib/Entity.js LF web/src/lib/Manager.js LF web/src/lib/World.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentManager.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentType.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentMapper.js LF web/src/lib/EntityManager.js LF web/src/lib/EntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/managers/GroupManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/PlayerManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/TagManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/TeamManager.js LF web/src/lib/systems/DelayedEntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/EntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/IntervalEntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/VoidEntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/IntervalEntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/exports.js > build/artemis.js  && cat web/src/lib/cclib-rt.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Bag.js LF web/src/lib/utils/BitSet.js LF web/src/lib/utils/MathUtils.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Map.js LF web/src/lib/utils/HashMap.js LF web/src/lib/utils/ImmutableBag.js LF web/src/lib/utils/IRandum.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Randum.js LF web/src/lib/utils/Timer.js LF web/src/lib/utils/UUID.js LF web/src/lib/annotations/Mapper.js LF web/src/lib/Component.js LF web/src/lib/Aspect.js LF web/src/lib/Entity.js LF web/src/lib/Manager.js LF web/src/lib/World.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentManager.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentType.js LF web/src/lib/ComponentMapper.js LF web/src/lib/EntityManager.js LF web/src/lib/EntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/managers/GroupManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/PlayerManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/TagManager.js LF web/src/lib/managers/TeamManager.js LF web/src/lib/systems/DelayedEntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/EntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/IntervalEntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/VoidEntitySystem.js LF web/src/lib/systems/IntervalEntityProcessingSystem.js LF web/src/lib/exports.js | java -jar packages/closure-compiler/lib/vendor/compiler.jar --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --js_output_file build/artemis.min,js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p build/web && mkdir -p build/lib
scripts.closure: npm run transpile && tools/convert && java -jar tools/plovr.jar build config.js
scripts.deploy: cp -rf web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -rf web/src ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/main.js ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets && cp -f web/project.json ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
scripts.preandroid: npm run predeploy && npm run transpile && npm run resources && cp -fr web/res ./web/frameworks/runtime-src/proj.android-studio/app/assets
